long_description: Sweetened with stevia and colored with vegetable and fruit juices, the CamelBak Mantra Drink Mix creates a refreshing beverage that enhances your water with natural flavors. Designed for reusable bottles to promote sustainability-great taste, less waste. All-natural ingredients with no artificial flavors, colors or sweeteners; made with the natural sweetener stevia for zero calories. Convenient powder stick packs are great for hydrating on the go. CamelBak Mantra Drink Mix is packed with antioxidants, vitamins and electrolytes that replenish as you hydrate. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Sweetened with stevia and colored with vegetable and fruit juices, the CamelBak Mantra Drink Mix creates a refreshing beverage that enhances your water with natural flavors.
